RelatedSentence: Budapest hosted today a working meeting between Alexey Miller , Chairman of the Gazprom Management Committee and Viktor Orban , Prime Minister of the Republic of Hungary .
Budapest hosted today a working meeting between Alexey Miller , Chairman of the Gazprom Management Committee and Viktor Orban , Prime Minister of the Republic of Hungary .
The parties addressed the current state of the South Stream project and highlighted that it was progressing on schedule .

Considering the plans of constructing a South Stream section in Austria , the joint decision was made to additionally investigate the new route of the Hungarian section towards Austria .

The meeting participants expressed their confidence that the choice of the gas pipeline route would n't affect the project schedule and first gas would be supplied via the Hungarian gas pipeline section in early 2017 .
